Игра хороша в своём жанре, но есть и свои недочёты связанные с багами и лагающим у маньяков инет, тем самым играя за выживших ты телепортируешься а не бежишь. И одна ГЛАВНАЯ ПРОБЛЕМА ИГРЫ, это сранные кемперы на маньяках, что в итоге они тебе чуть ли не в попу дышат и шанса на спасение мало, так ещё и выживших фиксят. Хотя и есть недочёты игра мне понравилась, потому что таких игр не так много и чтоб они были хорошими.

有一说一 我真心看不见制作组的用心 几乎全面都是在加强着屠夫 地窖的机制 新地图的路线 图腾的节奏 没有一点不是向着屠夫玩家改的 新地图里找图腾 我带着狩猎经验找了一圈全程只亮了两次 而且亮了这两次还是找不到图腾的具体位置 因为我在一楼找 技能给我亮的是二楼的图腾？恶咒毁灭就更不用讲 四个人能有一个修机都烧高香了 全程在找图腾 关键这还拼运气 我基本就是四个白图腾全都能找到 唯独就找不到火图腾 还有地图的渲染效果真的跟屎一样难受 从幼儿园里面到大门外面是两种不同的渲染效果 我站在大门中间什么都看不清 哪怕屠夫在我面前我也看不到 新地图的渲染更不用讲了 一会儿绿一会儿暗的 真的很难受 况且现在紫红段的玩家能跑出来保颗痘都已经很强了 还想加痘？可以啊 全程遛屠夫 最低修两台满机 救人救两次 外加还要跑出来就可以加颗痘了 是不是很简单？而且现在能见到的屠夫就三个 弗莱迪 护士 女鬼 新三幻神 要是能见到他们三以外的其他屠夫 也就一个可能 那个玩家在做任务 每次有人吐槽的时候官方就全程当空气一样看？这就是你们所谓的用心吗？我看是用心做皮肤圈钱还差不多（全员女鬼玩你妈？）

I think they did a pretty good job so far. 10/10

Крайне разочарован игрой. Единственное, что порадовало - широкий спектр выбора маньяков, умеренная оптимизация и бедная, но все же атмосфера хоррора. Однако главный минус игры - не получается найти выживших для лобби за маньяка. Вообще. Пробовал и напрямую подключать кабель, и и VPN ставить, и регион загрузки менять. Единственный раз, где я смог поиграть за него - обучение. Хотя когда ищешь в качестве выжившего народ быстро находится. Но из этого вытекает вторая проблема - пинг в игре от 180 как минимум, иногда подлетает до 350 мс. Искренне надеюсь, что этот сырой продукт доведут до ума.

Although the game's idea is great, it suffers from (gamebreaking) bugs, the performance is horrible and the P2P approach was never thought through. Killers can easily use lag/ short disconnects to their advantage. This reminds of the horrible "host-tool" abuse in old COD-titles. The game has the active playerbase and generates the money to switch to a more secure server architecture. However, this does not seem to be a possibility for the Devs.

Not to be recommended currently (unfortunatelly).

С добавлением маньяков все поменялось система ужасная. Нужный скил который ты хочешь не выпадает раз за разом а выпадает всякое не нужное гавно для определенного маньяка. Убивает эта система поиска скилов через паутину. Глупо. Дайте возможность выбирать то что мне нравится! Маньяк 50 уровня третий уровень престижа и все равно не выпадает то что ты хочешь!

(If you are looking for a rating 1-10 please look at the bottom of this review)

Dead by daylight is a multiplayer online game consisting of one killer and four survivors. The survivors are attempting to complete generators, destroy potential hex totems that destroy select killer perks if chosen, and rescue fellow survivors from the hooks the killer hangs them on before each phase runs its course and the survivor is sacrificed to the entity. Once all generators are completed the survivors must then open one of two exit doors and escape before the killer does what he was designed to do: kill them. The killers goal is to eliminate all survivors before all generators are completed, or before the last survivor jumps into the hatch (should 2 generators be completed). 

Pros to playing/owning the game: Opportunity to play with your friends & work together versus a single target: the killer. Many hours of enjoyable gameplay making new friends (and some enemies) along the way. A variety of different maps, perks, killers & survivors to aid in making each game unique when compared to the last. Nice survivor matching system generally enabling the killer (host) and survivors living within a fairly near range to versus one another leading to lower ping/lag enabling all parties involved to play the game. Fairly constant updates adjusting and rebalancing the game and all characters within it (buffing and nerfing as necessary).

Cons: Some minor bugs (decisive strike not working in survive/kill your friends, having to get to 35% struggle in normal gameplay to trigger decisive strike if you aren't obsession, hitboxes of killers too large when survivors vault through windows. Difficulty/wait time at higher ranks for killers and at times survivors to acquire games based on the in game ranking system team building mechanics. Nothing in place to deter killers from camping survivors hung on a hook thus ruining the game for the survivor in the long run. 

Overall rating: 8.5 based on 355 hours of playtime

Recenzja zawiera wypowiedzi z przyjętego przez autora punktu widzenia, tak by nie było hejtów :D
Dead By Daylight, czyli w skrócie DBD to gra która przez lata bawiła i bawi osoby kochące gry asymetryczne tzw. gry asymetryczne. DBD to według mnie pierwsza i najlepsza gra z tego gatunku. :D

В игре всего два дня. Играю только за маньяков. Итак впечатления:
Положительные:
1. НЕТУ.
Отрицательные:
1. Ожидание выживших 10 и более минут. Т.е. тупо сидишь и пялишься в экран.
2. Баланса нет от слова совсем. Я в игре всего 8 часов, у меня перс с всего с двумя перками первого и второго уровней а меня кидает к игрокам с четырьмя перками последнего уровня. Из-за чего нет фарма, прокачки и положительных эмоций.
3. Доп. контент - маньяки, выжившие, костюмы только за Донат. В магазине вроде есть возможность приобрести за награды в игре, но с таким балансом это нереально.

Greet game

Uno (/ˈuːnoʊ/; from Italian and Spanish for 'one'; stylized as UNO) is an American shedding-type card game that is played with a specially printed deck. The game's general principles put it into the Crazy Eights family of card games, and it is similar to the traditional European game Mau-Mau. 

The game was originally developed in 1971 by Merle Robbins in Reading, Ohio, a suburb of Cincinnati. When his family and friends began to play more and more, he spent $8,000 to have 5,000 copies of the game made. He sold it from his barbershop at first, and local businesses began to sell it as well. Robbins later sold the rights to UNO to a group of friends headed by Robert Tezak, a funeral parlor owner in Joliet, Illinois, for $50,000 plus royalties of 10 cents per game. Tezak formed International Games, Inc., to market UNO, with offices behind his funeral parlor. The games were produced by Lewis Saltzman of Saltzman Printers in Maywood, Illinois.

In 1992, International Games became part of the Mattel family of companies.[3]

改版改啊改啊的，現在變成排隊排了個寂寞，當人等房間，至少要等10-15分鐘不誇張，這種誇張地等法，除了早期我剛開始玩DBD那陣子有這種狀況，最近又開始變得排隊等房間等到天長地久，中間無聊到來改評論，大寫的【不推薦】，等你DBD什麼時候改善了排隊的問題，我再回來改評論囉~~~

2021/8/27(在此之前我都是推薦，但是最近已經把我的耐心磨掉了)

玩到現在也兩年了，玩的心情也從一開始躲著修，聽到心跳就嚇得半死，到現在每場都玩不同技能搭配。

這遊戲初期，新手不論玩人玩鬼，都不容易。最悲劇的是菜鳥人鬼，因為房間去配對到高等人鬼，玩人秒倒，玩鬼整場被甩著玩。但撐過新手期，上手後，樂趣才出來。

DBD是一款不斷在調整人鬼平衡的遊戲，技能道具也是一直調，不論怎麼調，兩邊人鬼都會有聲音，但其實最終還是技術問題，自己技術不夠，能力不足，就只好罵DBD囉。但其實不同時期玩到的DBD，感受都不一樣。

我專玩人，偶爾玩個鬼，永遠都是升不上去的20段菜鳥鬼，也是可能整場，都砍不到人、掛不到人的悲劇。除非剛好也都碰到菜鳥人，大家都不會玩。

2020/4/14


友誼的小船，說翻就翻。

然後，這是一個朋友比鬼還可怕的遊戲。
不論是雙排、三排、四排，朋友越多，死得越慘。

比如
一群人搶同一個櫃子躲
鬼在追我，好姊妹義氣相挺，幫忙卡路，敲板。(卡我的路，敲我板)
果然人就是要有義氣呢!

之前更新過後，有一陣子會順，但又更新新地圖、人物、又會一堆卡。卡過一陣，等遊戲順暢應該又能玩了。
廠商還是有在努力解決各種bugs啦，值得稱讚。
這個遊戲玩上手之後，可以挑戰各種不同玩法。

2019/3/21

如果不是DBD本身遊戲很好玩，遊戲之中的各種卡，真的能叫人發瘋啊!

開遊戲被卡，進入大廳被卡，進入遊戲被卡，遊戲中被卡，各種奇奇怪怪的狀況都能讓你被卡，然後被自動踢出遊戲。可說集一堆卡於一身的大Bug遊戲

然後被各種卡，依然堅持要玩這個遊戲，這真的是自虐。

被卡到很想吐槽，DBD應該改名叫卡又卡。

每次一開新，就是各種卡。每天玩遊戲就好像在拜神，拜託今天別卡。

遊戲本身有多好玩呢?
喜歡的人就喜歡囉，體驗各種不同玩法，當人搭配各種技能，嘗試潛行修發電機，還是跑給鬼追，大玩心理戰，逛地圖大街，開箱找寶物，拆拆鉤子救救人，或是掛在鉤子上當臘腸。

只要不被卡，是真的很好玩。
2018/11/12
Good gameplay, lots of fun and above all good reward system.

So. This game has its ups and downs. The community can either be really salty and terrible, or they can be wonderfully nice and friendly. I have had a good mix of both sides. The new updates have been making the game more interesting and fun, especially with the new-ish cosmetic store. I enjoy this game a lot, but lord knows that it makes me frustrated. Some killers will tunnel you down, camp you at the hook, or lagswitch. None of that is fun or fair. And I don't think reporting does much. Despite its flaws, I can't help and be obsessed with the game. I don't know why. I just am.

The game has gotten far too easy for killers. Survivors quit within the first minute of almost every game because of how frustrating it is. In its current state, the game is only fun 2% of the time when you get a killer who doesn't have access to good perks. Bugs that have been in the game since last year still aren't fixed and its nearly impossible to find a game with less that 100 ping, even on a wired connection. "Game balances" have destroyed survivor perks instead of balancing them. If you're going to play this game solo (which next to nobody does because of how bad the solo experience is), don't queue survivor unless you feel like throwing your pc out of a window.

Dodatki troszke drogie ale Michael Myers, Leatherface i Freddy K. naprawde robia robote jesli chodzi o strach w grze i bardzo przyjemnie sie nimi gra.

Behaviour Interactive is the kind of developer that takes a long time fixing their games (game now since the other was a failure) and whose main focus rather than gameplay, a better community or balance lies withing making new cosmetics as it's not interesting for them to actually fix the game.

The game has lots of problems with it's current balance and what's supposed to be an asymmetrical game in which the supposedly power unit is always at the mercy of survivors.

As a survivor you get your good bunch of second chance perks that when used together are pretty much impossible to counter, a good amount of loops and pallets that even with the so called mind games waste a lot of time in a game where in 2 minutes or less half of the objectives can be done by the survivors leaving killers with barely enough time to achieve a tie, this of course is if the survivors are half decent, if we're talking about a SWF with good comms it's an entirely different story as the game turns into a simple, don't make mistakes or don't make costly mistakes at least.

As a killer you play what should be the power role and sure it'll feel like that for the first 50 hours of gameplay but as the ranking system works it's impossible to derank as you rank up with almost no effort, it's simply something that hasn't been fixed since the inception of the game. 

Your main objective as the killer is to sacrifice survivors by hooking them 3 times each for a total amount of 12 hooks wich means you at the very least need to hit survivors 8 times in order to down em all, which very rarely happens as they can also heal and gain time doing so. 

So far the game puts an unrealistic expectation on the killer side as there's simply not enough time in the match unless you're playing one of the top killers in the games, makes it hard for the average solo player and it's an absolute breeze for swfs with half decent comms.

And we haven't even gotten to the worst part of the game and something that has stayed the same since the game came out... The toxic community, mainly survivor mains, that promotes bullying, harassment and insults in the game. You won't ever find a match where someone is not tbaging, holding the game hostage, hiding with the gates open to take the hatch in the last second just to make you wait 2 whole minutes before having the ability to leave the game and constant insults, death threats and harassment on your steam profiles. Don't believe me? play for a hundred hours with your comments on public and you'll see how bad it is.

As I said behaviour Interactive main focus is on releasing cosmetics and half assed chapters with pretty much no intent to fix the game as they very rarely update it or try shifting towards a more diverse meta. They're happy with the current state of the game and won't ever try to do anything else.

Now to end this review, I'd recommend you not to buy this game ever, yeah sure it's entertaining and quite addictive but it's simply not worth investing in a game when the devs really don't care about the problems plaguing their game and if you're gonna buy it anyways, then just play survivor and avoid the stress that comes playing killer as it's just an unfun experience once you arrive at red ranks that with the current system is fairly easy to do.

A game full of campers , cheaters and non team players, not worth the buy, the decvs only worry about thier money, not your experience, they allow killers to face camp you in your face and tunnel you, and you get shit for points and they get all, so yea this game is stupid and not worth your money or patience fuck the devs and this game and the cheaters they allow in it
